alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:02AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nueces and south central San Patricio Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 601 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Odem, or 8 miles northeast of Robstown, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Odem, Calallen and Annaville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 12 and 22. US Highway 77 between mile markers 650 and 658. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
